channel.title: Dont look here! please dont! [private]
channel.description:
Lol now that i got ur attention well My question is:
If i wanted someone else to host my server because my computer is a bit slow anyway if i wanted wat files would i have to send to the person all of them??
if i give all the files doesnt that give him full power over my server???

item.title: Dont look here! please dont! [private]
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

You only need the java files if you wish to edit them.The class files are not editable and they store the data.So before you delete the java files make a copy of your server and keep the one with the java files for yourself and send the one without it to the host.

Read full topic

item.title: Dont look here! please dont! [private]
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

My recommendation is have someone you can trust etc. Perhaps someone you know is a reputable member of this community. Phonecheck hosted my own server for a little bit, and I sent it all to him, .java files etc included. However, obviously you can’t do that with everyone on here…
One might even go as far as adding some anti-theft mechanisms. ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: 29 December 2006, 12:12:15[/size][hr][quote=“Kriptick, post:4, topic:40510”]dont we need the client.java file to work the server?? or do we only need the class files to acctually get the data from??[/quote]
Only the class files.

Read full topic

item.title: Dont look here! please dont! [private]
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

If your unsure if he/she will mess with your java files.Heres what you do.
Delete only the java files and remove the compiler.Leave the class files,cfg files,txt files,and runserver.bat.
The only thing he/she will have power over is your character files but he/she will not be able to edit your java files.

Read full topic
